resources.string: You are ok? Everything is ok?
You think you are sick? Maybe Corona? Stay home!
You have corona virus! Stay quarantine mode
Help humanity donnating blood! \n Someone needs you
The donor\'s way is as follows
Address: Str. Dr. Caracas Constantin no. 2-8, Sector 1, Bucharest
Some advice for protect yourself to coronavirus
Wash your hands often; use soap and water or alcohol-based hand sanitizer;
Wear a mask when physical distance is not possible;
Do not touch your eyes, nose or mouth;
When you cough or sneeze, cover your nose and mouth with an elbow crease or a napkin
Stay home if you don\'t feel well
If you have a fever, cough and difficulty breathing, consult a doctor
